text: James Reginald Colley (May 24, 1880 – November 8, 1968) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of British Columbia from 1924 to 1928 from the electoral district of Kamloops, as a Liberal. He was the Mayor of Kamloops from 1923-1924Kamloops Mayors List ==References== Category:1880 births Category:1968 deaths Category:British Columbia Liberal Party MLAs Category:Mayors of Kamloops Category:Politicians from Yorkshire Category:20th-century Canadian politicians
title: James Reginald Colley
